summary: This module defines abstract base classes that encapsulate the core functionality of a quantum circuit sampler primitive. They manage circuit and parameter preparation, default shot handling, job submission, and result packaging, while delegating the actual execution to concrete subclass implementations.
business_intent: Offer a reusable foundation for developers to implement sampler primitives that can be integrated into Qiskitâ€™s runtime, enabling consistent generation of measurement outcome distributions from quantum circuits for quantum algorithm development and execution.
